testcase.name: Follow Up Form - Verifying Enhanced Symptoms Question - Service Portal
testcase.system-out: Given a COVIDCode user is on the Follow Up Form to update an existing enrollment.passed When the user is on the Disease Course section to add information...........passed Then the user is able to select multiple symptoms in the symptoms field.....passed When the user selects "None of the above" after having selected multiple symptoms.passed Then the user sees a pop up with the message "Choosing None of the Above will clear the previously selected values, is that Ok?".passed When the user selects Yes...................................................passed Then "None of the above" option displays and replaces all previously selected symptoms.passed When the user attempts to add a symptom such as "Cough" after selecting "None of the above" option.passed Then the user sees another pop up with the message "Choosing this symptom will result in previous options being removed, is that Ok?".passed When the user selects Yes...................................................passed Then "Cough" symptom is displayed...........................................passed When selecting "Don't know" after having selected a symptoms................passed Then the user is able to see another pop up with the message "Choosing Don't Know will clear the previously selected values, is that Ok?".passed When the user selects Yes...................................................passed Then "Don't know" option displays...........................................passed
